meanings.sent1: The students in the class outnumbers the chairs available.
meanings.sent2: During the game, the players on the field outnumbers the referees.
meanings.sent3: The number of cookies on the plate outnumbers the hungry children in the room.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky outnumbers the grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The ants in the anthill outnumbers the blades of grass in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The birds in the park outnumbers the squirrels.
meanings.sent2: In the forest, the trees outnumbers the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The toys in the toy box outnumbers the space available.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops on the window outnumbers the seconds passing by.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden outnumbers the bees buzzing around.
